events.title: Marshall's first win after the loss of 37 players, against Xavier University

movie.title: We Are Marshall
movie.plot: When a plane crash claims the lives of members of the Marshall University football team and some of its fans, the team's new coach and his surviving players try to keep the football program alive.

movie.title: Get on Up
movie.plot: A chronicle of James Brown's rise from extreme poverty to become one of the most influential musicians in history.

events.title: Kiranjit Ahluwalia's sentence is reduced and she is released for time served

movie.title: Provoked: A True Story
movie.plot: Provoked is the true story of Kiranjit Ahluwalia, a Punjabi woman who moved to London after her marriage with Deepak Ahluwalia. Her husband seemed caring at first but then began to beat her up. He started drinking a lot and sleeping around with other women. he also subjected her to spousal rape. After ten years and having two children with him, out of fear, she sets him on fire.

events.title: Deborah Lipstadt finds out that David Irving is suing her publisher, Penguin Books

movie.title: Denial
movie.plot: Acclaimed writer and historian Deborah E. Lipstadt must battle for historical truth to prove the Holocaust actually occurred when David Irving, a renowned denier, sues her for libel.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 2 nominations.
